Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 85th overall pick, by Penn in 1963...
Traded from Penn to Boston (UBA) on 7/6/1965 (Going to PEN: LF J. Leeds, 2B G. Dueñas, SS M. Doggett. Going to PIL: RF W. Perras, RF M. Fagenson, C C. Maddux)...
Injured on 5/22/1967 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 9/26/1969, off Darrell Palen (GHG)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/1972, off Aaron Zayas (Ash)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 3/1/1979 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/14/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 3/1/1982 to a minor league contract.
